A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I would put zero stars if I could\, but apparently I can not. In short\, the movie was an ABSOLUTE disappointment. The director was incompetent at best. The music director's music score was no better than a 5 year old who doesn't know how to play an instrument whatsoever. The characters\, as well as the plot\, were COMPLETELY garbage! My advice\, don't waste your money and you time by watching this sorry excuse for a movie.
